game.name: The Demon Lord is New in Town!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A Resource Management Adventure Game -- Play as Van, a demon lord who has had his power sealed, and has been banished to the world of mortals. Make friends and work towards regaining your former glory!
